Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FluChip-8G Influenza A + B Assay, a multiplex RT-PCR in vitro diagnostic for detection and differentiation of seasonal and non-seasonal influenza A subtypes and influenza B lineages.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of seasonal influenza A/H3N2, A/H1N1pdm09, non-seasonal influenza A subtypes, and genetic lineage of human influenza B viruses (B/Victoria, B/Yamagata) from nasopharyngeal and nasal swabs from patients with respiratory infection symptoms, for use with clinical and epidemiological risk factors.
